Html:
Greetings :-)

Thank you for creating this app. I really think the ability to copy a node's xpath is a really nice feature.

One thing that I think would really improve the app however is the display of the XML. The current view is not much better than notepad in my opinion. For example when I open an XML that has nodes with many attributes they extend way over off the screen causing me to have to scroll back and forth.

Honestly I think XML notepad has a great way to visualize the XML, it would be great if XML explorer added the ability to view the XML in a tree view type fashion like XML notepad has.

 

Thanks!

Keep up the good work!
